title: The Republic of the Philippines
creator_credit: Leo Guelpa Jr, United World Films and Dudley Pictures
brief_description: Republic of the Philippines, seen through the eyes of a young Filipino teacher. The geographical background, the native races, the landscape, cultivation of various crops, the development of industries, mineral resources, forest products and hydro-electricity, and the growth of the education and public health systems.
